name: quantms-proteomics-quantification
title: QuantMS: Quantitative Mass Spectrometry Proteomics
description: Quantitative proteomics analysis from DDA/DIA mass spectrometry. Protein identification, quantification (LFQ, TMT, SILAC), and differential expression with MaxQuant/OpenMS.
content:
QuantMS: Proteomics Quantification

Comprehensive quantitative proteomics from LC-MS/MS data. Supports label-free (LFQ), TMT/iTRAQ isobaric labeling, and SILAC with OpenMS/MaxQuant workflows.

Applications

  • Differential Proteomics: Disease vs control protein changes
  • Drug Response: Proteomic changes after treatment
  • Biomarker Discovery: Identify disease-associated proteins
  • PTM Analysis: Phosphoproteomics, ubiquitination

Key Outputs

  • Protein Quantification: Intensity matrices
  • Peptide IDs: FDR-filtered identifications
  • DE Analysis: Differential expression results
  • QC Metrics: Identifications, coverage, missing values

Perfect for: Proteomics quantification • TMT/LFQ • Differential protein expression • Biomarker discovery
